nodes.bodyText: I feel this check defeats a bit the purpose of using ExpressionUtils.skipParentheses(...);, Won't it be possible to already arrive here which a (Nullable) ExpressionTree instead? It would make things easier.

The only reason of keeping the lambda as 2nd parameter is to ultimately check for the parameter symbol (3 calls below). Wouldn't it be possible to check this earlier (only one param for instance) and only pass a symbol?
This change does not seem required to me, you kept it in the other file.
